snippet.title: Super Mario 64: Royal Legacy Definitive Edition | Release Trailer
snippet.description:
4 years ago, I released my first ROM hack of Super Mario 64. Now, I'd like to present to you the Definitive Edition version of that hack, Royal Legacy.

Very special thanks to aglab2 and Nobbie, both of whom carried a majority of this remastering project.

This special edition features the following:
*new bonus content
*full console compatibility
*a beautiful visual makeover
*a new custom Bowser Fight
*huge adjustments to the difficulty curve
*a fully remastered HD soundtrack
*various other quality of life fixes/enhancements

The three of us are proud to present Royal Legacy in its top form. Please enjoy and have fun!

Available for download at the following link:
https://romhacking.com/hack/sm64-royal-legacy-definitive-edition
